headline: How Medtronic's Expanded Board and New Focus Committees Have Changed Its Investment Story (MDT)
summary: On August 19, 2025, Medtronic announced an expanded board and two new independent directors, together with the creation of focused committees dedicated to growth initiatives and operational improvements, following constructive engagement with Elliott Investment Management. This governance shift underscores an increased emphasis on portfolio management, cost optimization, and tuck-in M&A to unlock Medtronic's full potential amid continued focus on its Diabetes business separation. We'll...

headline: 3 Best Dividend Stocks to Buy Now
summary: Companies that have increased their dividends annually for 25 consecutive years are a rare breed. These three also stand out for their attractive yields.
